SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into admin_login_log (admin_id, create_time, ip, address, user_agent) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update admin_login_log set admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_agent = #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, admin_id, create_time, ip, address, user_agent from admin_login_log
